Un juego precioso en todos los sentidos, personajes que logran encariñarte, banda sonora excelente, una historia que te va a mantener intrigado hasta el punto de no poder dejar de jugarlo y con un final que te va a dejar sin palabras, el precio es perfecto pero si lo encuentran en oferta comprenlo sin dudar, ademas los dlc aportan mucho mas contenido al juego y a la historia de Rapture.

Bioshcock Infinite is an amazing game with an immersive story line and style of combat.
Bioshcock Infinite has a lot of replay value due to those details that are missed for the first time you play the game. But once you play it again and again, you learn more and understand more than you did the first time.

I first downloaded the cracked version of this game, and I loved it so much that when I got enough money I immediately bought the game, this is one of the best games ive played in my life, and with the 2 dlcs it comes full circle with the first bioshock, it is an amazing game and i would recommend this game to anyone who is looking to be mindblown by an amazing storyline, you can play this game without playing the other two bioshocks, but you NEED to play all the saga, they are all masterpieces.

[i]Игру приобрёл 13 июля 2013, и задам себе вопрос. Почему я ее не прошел еще тогда? Почему я упустил возможность пройти ее еще 5 лет назад????... Я не понимаю, но есть и плюс такого долгового прохождения, это русская озвучка, которая сделана выше всех похвал. Но и сюжет, это отдельная история завершения всей серии. Последний раз меня шокировала концовка только в одной игре в COD BO, сюжетный поворот вокруг Алекса Мэйсона. Больше я такого не переживал, вот что бы игра настолько поразила. Браво. Браво. Браво…[/i]

IO ho giocato tanti giochi nella mia vita da videogiocatore, da Nintendo a Xbox, PC e playstation ma tra tutte le magnifiche storie, devo ammettere che questa me la ricorderò. Io ho solo 14 anni e quando ne avevo 10 avevo provato a giocare questo titolo per xbox 360, non mi era piaciuto e non lo avevo capito, ora ho esplorato tutti i posti possibili, sono arrivato fino in fondo alla storia e...sono rimasto emozionato, non voglio spoilerare niente quindi posso solo dire che non vi pentirete di avere speso $29,00 per questo capolavoro.

普通难度15小时通关本体加dlc,一开始觉得艹突突突真tm爽，艹异能真tm爽，除了空轨不知道在哪降落和指路系统有点迷还行，到dlc的时候就是艹，又没子弹了，艹，我怎么又死了，无双变成潜行。剧情一开始不错，结局我个人觉得难以接受dlc剧情也不喜欢。如果喜欢突突突的玩家海葬dlc可以不玩了，反正突突又突不了，只能靠潜行维持生活。这款游戏打折买的话，还行.

Gameplay: 8/10 This is a mostly generic shooter, but it has its twists and little things that make it a little more unique. The gameplay is fun but not amazing.

Story: 10/10 The story to this game is very developed and even if it doesn't quite match the themes of the other Bioshock games, this game has a very interesting story.

Graphics: 9/10 The graphics are decent but not next-gen. The scenes are characters look good and what more could we ask for?

Design: 7/10 The levels are linear, and the combat mechanics are pretty standard. The gameplay manages to be fun and runs smoothly but is nothing super special.

Overall: 8.5/10 This game has a fun story and is a pretty good shooter as well. Experiencing the story is the best part for sure but overall its pretty good.

Amazing story- it's like a Chris Nolan story on steroids, put into a video game with awesome gameplay, fun mechanics, interesting characters, and an inspiring and immersive universe!

el mejor juego que yo alla jugado de modo historia tiene una historia muy profunda y muy bien desaarrollada la cual te va a estar enamorando constantemente y te va a crear una empatia con los personajes hasta al grado de querer ver mas alla de lo que te muestran superfisialmente es uno de los mejores juegos de la historia lo recomiendo al 100 porciento el mejor
스토리는 모르겠지만 긴장감 넘치고 화려한 플레이와 여주로 만족하는 게임.. 갓겜은 확실하다

Ultima reseña de la saga, esta vez con bioshock infinite, aqui somos Booker DeWitt, un investigador privado de Nueva York el cual tiene una deuda, y la unica forma de saldarla es yendo a la ciudad de las nubes, Columbia, en busca de una chica que no es en nada lo que parece... Si bien el argumento y resumen del principio es mas corto que en los demas juegos de la saga, no se queda atras con respecto a los otros dos titulos.

Puntos Positivos:
- Graficos excelentes a pocos recursos
- Personajes humanos y empaticos
- Narrativa admirable
- Gran variedad de armas

A pesar de requerir menos recursos que los otros dos titulos, este es sin duda el que mejores graficos tiene, solo necesitas 2 gb de ram y un procesador equivalente a un i3 (como mi caso :'V) para que corra a 40 fps minimo. Cambiando a temas de historia y narrativa, los personajes son, sin duda, la cereza del pastel, Booker refleja su oscuro pasado y experiencia con un tono frio y poca amabilidad, ademas de una extrema sinceridad, tanta que puede hacer daño; por otro lado, Elizabeth es un cacho de pan bimbo remojado en leche (literalmente... yo si le daba :V) que refleja sus vivencias dentro de "La Torre" con la curiosidad por el exterior y con la frustracion que siente hacia su celador, Songbird, ademas de que sus reacciones ante la sinceridad y acciones de Booker son realmente humanas y realistas. La narrativa no se deja detalles, te hace querer a ambos personajes principales y te hace sentir la vida de la ciudad de Columbia. Ademas podemos tener en cuenta la gran variedad de armas, yendo desde simples pistolas, hasta lanzagranadas incendiarios.

Puntos Negativos:
- Final rapido y en algunos casos confuso
- Poca variedad de "plasmidos", ahora llamados vigores

El final es una completa violacion mental, bueno, he visto finales mas destructivos que este y con un poco de meditacion se puede entender, pero el usuario promedio no lo entenderia a la primera y en casos extremos, se requerira pasarse el juego de nuevo, multiples veces. Algo malo con respecto a este juego es su poca cantidad de Vigores (los poderes de este juego), solo son 8, aunque pueden suplir facilmente casi todas las necesidades, mis favoritos son Cuervos Asesinos, Posesion y Devolver al Remitente.

En conclusion, un juego malditamente bueno, pero sin duda deben jugar los anteriores titulos para entenderlo del todo, grandes personajes con un gran desarrollo, sin duda de los mejores juegos que he jugado en mi vida y pasa a mi salon de la fama con honores. Sin dudas un 9/10, aunque no me importaria darle un 10/10.

PD: El modo Columbia's Finest/Combate en las Nubes es bastante entretenido.
plot twist é o que não falta

NEREDEYSE KUSURSUZ !

Parasını sonuna kadar hakeden bir oyun hikayesi bölüm tasarımları Tatlı şirin Grafikleri Evreni herşey çok iyi düşünülmüş 
Hiç düşünmeden alın bu oyun bitirilmeyi sonuna kadar hakediyor !

Bioshock serisinin yeri benim için oldukça farklıdır.

İlk oyunundan itibaren hayranlıkla oynadığım ve her anından zevk aldığım oyunun son serisi olan infiniti benim için bir yükselme noktası gibi bir şeydi heralde..

Nasıl anlatsam bilmiyorum ama öncelikle hatırladığım bir detayı paylaşmak istiyorum ki infiniti çıktığı senenin zaten en iyi fps oyunun seçilmişti.

Bunun üzerine benim incelememin ne kadar sizde bir yeri olur özellikle bu kadar geç kalmışken ne anlam ifade eder bilmiyorum ama... Finali oynarken ağzımdan sigaranın düşmesi ve ardı ardına yüzlerce kere oha demiş olmam..

Grafiktir oynanıştır bahsetmeyeceğim hikayesi o kadar güzel ki kendine oyuncu diyen her insanın en azından bir kez oynayıp bitirmesi gerektiği bir oyun olduğunu düşünüyorum.

Soru işaretleriniz var ise silin ve alın !

画风和BGM满分，游戏默认的开镜和技能按键有点蛋疼，射击手感中上。
一周目困难10小时，上手难度一般，流程也短了些。不过二周目1999模式难度大幅上升，有点肝不动了。
八种异能都很有特色，搭配各色武器，战斗手段非常丰富。我最喜欢牛头冲刺配合手炮一路莽过去。
最后，伊妹简直不能再赞！能和各种场景互动，着实一个活生生的少女，战斗时还是神队友。

生化奇兵系列在出色的剧情之外，对于环境的塑造也属于上乘
每一件物品，每一个窗口的设计繁复但不臃肿，恰到好处地给玩家描绘了一个蒸汽朋克世界
然而很多玩家并不会注意到
如果有机会的话建议好好欣赏一下游戏的美工，而不是以过关为目的

Oyun çok güzel Elizabeth daha da güzel. <3

不知道是不是我打开的方式不对，我对本作的品质是非常赞赏的，对伊丽莎白这个塑造得非常成功的人物也觉得赞同，可我就是难以喜欢这款游戏。

推荐指数9/10。

鄙人是一个战斗向的玩家，个人非常不喜欢那种时空错乱、如梦如幻、支离破碎、撕扯、压抑、扭曲的剧情。还是《老滚》那种英雄拯救世界的剧情更符合我的胃口。

评测中几乎全是赞美本作的，我就根据个人意见提一些不足之处吧。

1，主角经常卡在桌子边缘以及其他的一些奇怪的地方。
2，伊丽莎白走路挤人2333。
3，属性成长机制不完善：魔法鸡肋，鄙人只会用雷电那个；金钱与自动售货机的分配不太合理，最后激烈的战斗中，没有自动售货机。
4，战斗重复性太高，后期令人疲倦。

So first off, i had played both Bioshock 1&2 and i had a blast with both of them. 
So naturally, i played Bioshock Infinite, with the expectation that i would be playing a Bioshock game. 
Sadly, this was not the case. 

The Gameplay has no depth whatsoever. All fights play like call of duty, with no strategy involved. The Levels are very linear, despite the fact that we are in a city in the clouds. Meanwhile, Rapture never felt linear, even though we were literally trapped in small corridors within an ocean.
The Graphics are good, but lack any personality.  
The Story is obviously the games strongpoint. However, both Elizabeth and Booker never shut up. I often don't bother listening to a voxophone, because i know they will talk over it, and i would have to listen to it again. The Ending was very good. They should have probably made this a movie instead of a video game.

"Burial at Sea: Episode 1" was quite an enjoyable trip to rapture. The Story was interesting. This Episode also featured Gameplay however, which was quite unfortunate. 

In "Burial at Sea: Episode 2" they tried to implement Stealth gameplay. It was fun at first but it completely broke down halfway through the Episode. The Enemies are dumb as hell, and can't see you if you sneak 2 meters in front of them. On top of that, the mechanics are very simple to exploit, making this episode far more easier and boring. 

This Game does not deserve the Title "Bioshock".

云端天堂的景色再美丽，也不及你的眼睛好看。Elizabeth，只有你幸福，我的人生才有意义。——Booker
음 나는 잘모르겠다 높은 연출력과 스토리는 좋아도 반복되는 플레이와 난이도는 지루함을 주게된다

Okay, so let me get this straight first.

The story itself is stupid, and the way the antagonists are portrayed as cartoonishly evil is pretty dumb, and makes them to be hardly believable villains in how obvious and "mwahaha I'm evil" the ♥♥♥♥ they do is.

But now, Elizabeth as a character, is the strongest part of the game in my opinion.

Perfect example, I hate the stupid prompt that says "Elizabeth is a strong independant whamen, and don't need no protections frum a mayn :))" but I like the way you can hear her struggle to stay safe behind cover and while she scrounges for things amidst the fighting to help the team (You and her) fight through the enemy (Without trying to explicitly tell you that she has a ♥♥♥♥♥♥ therefore the game needs to reassure you that she's able to perform the basic human function of being able to shoot a gun.)

An example of the enemy being cartoonishly evil is how the primary antagonist, whats-his-face, Evil-christian-man, takes the credit away from the civil war era version of Snake for fighting in a couple battles.

I understand that the guy is trying to portray himself as great to try to sway the people to like him, but do you really think that someone socially aware enough to control a small nation/city/state like columbia, would be dumb enough to take credit and satisfaction away from the few people who could likely overthrow him?

And whats with all the needlessly evil propaganda?

Do you really think he'd make a small little clip of him pointing at all the tears coming up around columbia from elizabeth and do a big dumb "Well I don't ♥♥♥♥in' know lol" at the people?

And not just that, another writing trope, oh no, the main antagonist is dying from some conveiniently contracted hyper-tumor-cancer thats uncurable, all you've gotta do is run awaaaayyy.

I mean, all of this stuff got so bad to the point where I started throwing the antagonist a couple bones, omitting a few of the stupid things they writ in, and once you do, you realize you're just stealing a man's daughter away from him, a man who, although controlling, and crazy from the way the story writes him, won't be around for much longer, and will allow his daughter control of the city which she could've made better.

So yeah, at a point, I started cheering for the enemy, even though I know by the end of the game its probably going to end with you knocking the paradise down into the ocean and saying "YEEE I KILLED THE BAD GUYYY"

I just strongly dislike protraying one side as absolute evil or absolute good, because the real world is never so simple, you've gotta show people that there are no easy choices, "They's the bad guys so shootum" isn't going to be whats going to help you through life.

Its going to be understanding that different people fight for different things for different reasons, and they all mean things to them, and its more of a question of how much that thing means to you.

So, to sum this all up, Story's dumb, Motivations are dumb, Elizabeth is great, and close to one of my favorite new characters I've seen, Prompts are dumb, and the gameplay is a tad clunky but fun, I'd probably shoot her dad and help her lead columbia aaaand honestly I'd rather side with the citizenry of columbia than whoever shooty-mc-bang-bang is that you play as, I forget his name.

7/10 with elizabeth, 4/10 without, remove the shooting and give me 40 hours of walking around a fair with elizabeth, 10/10.

Это одна из тех игр,которые берут именно сюжетом.Очень жаль писать этот обзор,но ничего не остается,игра уже пройдена.Главным плюсом этой игры является Элизабет,которая при первой встрече,пленяет вас своей красотой и характером.Разработчики очень над ней постарались и создали нечто...Прекрасное.Среди прочих плюсов,стоит отметить графику,многообразие оружия,колорит противников и достаточно неплохую физику.Минусов в этой игре,кажется,нет,но они определено  есть,я в ней ничего плохого не нашел,Достаточно интересный сюжет захватывает своим разветвлением,здесь есть-воздушный город,параллельные вселенные и немало важная концовка,которая у меня оставила несколько вопросов.Перейдем к оружию-его здесь достаточно,стоит отметить и физику самого оружия,если вы взяли тяжелый дробовик,то и вес у него будет соответствующий,чтобы было с чем сравнивать,взгляните на физику оружия CoD advanced warfare.Всего моего обзора не хватит,чтобы описать все прелести игры,поэтому лучшее,что я могу посоветовать-это купить эту игру и убедиться в этом.10/10

First of all, you must play the Trilogy, absolutely. They are the most authentic FPS games in my opinion. Why?
-Amazing level design in three games, Rapture and Columbia are utopic cities, love the view and fighting in them.
-A very different philosophy of life in Trilogy (mostly in Infinite)
-Perfect gameplay which is includes plasmits and too cool weapons also hit feeling is great too.
-A compact story with Bioshock and Bioshock: Infinite, I mean Constants and Variables :) (Second game kinda out story but it has the best gameplay imo.)
-Deeply designed characters and extras for explore the lore and the world.
  
But there is some few bad things too.
-It's not a "choices matter" game like other Bioshock's or Immersive-Sim games, why I said that? Cuz you will make numerous choices in the game but there is only ONE ending sadly. (but ending is spectacular)
-Game does not give you the free run-walk so we can't explore the city, people etc.
-Even in hard mode(which I played nonsteam) game is not difficult at all. Elizabeth find ammo and medic for you during the combat.
-Plasmids are less than other games and not too much effective.

Final is:
Graphics: 10/10
Sound: 10/10
Story: 100000/10
Physics: 9/10
AI: 7/10
World Design: 10000/10
Characters and Dialogues: 10/10


You must play Burial At Sea DLC too! For the story it's a necessity.

Одна из немногих игр, ради которых потом идешь на Ютуб, чтобы узнать про упущенные моменты и вспомнить забытые элементы. Шикарная история и удивительная красота картинки. Играть нужно всем, даже если никогда не видели предыдущие части, которые отличные, но уходят на второй план. Ждем новых творений Кена Левина!

10 / 10. The best game I've ever played.

When I first bought the game I doubted if I would like it due to some people saying it was not as good as the original Bioshock games, but this game is probably the best story-driven game I've ever played.

The characters are impecable, you end up feeling as if you really knew them, the story is just amazing and so is the music. And the end... The ending is the best ending I've ever seen, it leaves me shocked even after having the played the whole game various times. 

All in all, a masterpiece no gamer should miss.
갓-겜

В свое время игра Bioshock была открытием. Диски с ней передавались из рук в руки  и приходили из- за частых установок в полную негодность. Затем вышла вторая часть – она ,конечно, уступала в сюжетном плане, но брала возможностью поиграть за Большого Папочку.
Теперь спустя много лет я без сомнений взял Инфинит со всеми на тот момент дополнениями. Прекрасная оптимизация (я не про дополнения), завораживающие панорамы все это присутствует. Но….
Можно брать с собой только(!!!!!!) 2  вида оружия. И его нельзя модернизировать, разновидностей патронов также не наблюдается.  Поначалу  мне было скучно: какой то невнятный сюжет, перестрелки не впечатляющие, постоянные отсылки к истории Америки. Но если вытерпеть – то концовка вывозит всю игру.
Bioshock  по -прежнему удивляет и радует. Концовку вы будете обдумывать долго.
Чего не скажешь о дополнениях. 
Clash in the Clouds  что -то вроде режима рейд в Resident Evil, но очень ему уступает.  После пары боев, где вы оказываетесь сразу между трех механиков,  вам уже не захочется играть далее.
Burial at Sea - Episode One вообще не дополнение, а какое то издевательство. Короткое ,  до безобразия, с невнятным тупым сюжетом.  Не брать не за какие деньги.
Burial at Sea - Episode Two уже достойное дополнение. Затягивающее. С достойным арсеналом. Больше всего походит на классический BioShock. Однако сюжет та еще шляпа. Какого буя важна так эта Салли? Кто она бл????  Чего с ней все так возятся? По скидке взять можно.
9из 10.
